description.value:
The wererat makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage. If the target is a &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid}, it must succeed on a [[/save con 11 format=long]] or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

items.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)

description.value:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

monsterMunch.fullName: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only).

description.value:
Shapechanger. The wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a &Reference[giant]{giant} rat, or back into its true form, which is &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid}. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isnâ€™t transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Keen Smell. The wererat has advantage on &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
